name: The Girl of Glass: A Summer Bird's Tale - The Journey Begins
name_original: The Girl of Glass: A Summer Bird's Tale - The Journey Begins
description:
Become Kristal, the girl of glass, who is struggling with growing up, letting go of the past, and finding a future to believe in. On your journey of discovery, visit numerous places and meet a wonderful cast of characters to interact with – all in very detailed, hand-painted graphics.

The Girl of Glass tells a charming coming-of-age tale with its unique characters, beautiful settings, and many dialogue options and choices that impact the story. In the prologue version of the game, you meet Kristal at a circus. One day a boy arrives and convinces her to run away with him.

This free title contains the first hour of The Girl of Glass - A Summer Bird's Tale.
Your progress is transferred upon purchasing the full game.

The Journey Begins Features:

  • Find out why Kristal's adventure began and what urged her to embark on her quest of discovery.
  • Meet the circus people and interact with them using various flavourful dialogue options.
  • Discover the adventure part of the game - how to navigate the world around you, interact with objects, and use them to solve mysteries.
  • Learn about the basics of the puzzle-like, turn-based combat, and test your prowess against an angry cat.
  • Get a glimpse of the beautiful, hand-painted environments that surround Kristal throughout her whole journey.
